description: This requirement is open only to those TBIPS Supply Arrangement Holders who qualified under Tier 1 for services in the National Capital Region for the following categories: ...
full_summary:
## Cyber Protection Services Request for Proposal (RFP)

### Important Document Information

* Publication Date: January 25, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: March 4, 2024 (2:00 PM EST)
* Expected Contract Start Date: April 1, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2027

### Brief Description of Work

Fisheries and Oceans Canada is seeking a Request for Proposal (RFP) fromTS/IPs (Technology Service Providers) for the provision of Cyber Protection Services. The successful bidder will provide a team of IT Security and/or Cybersecurity professionals to support various IT projects, including Identity and Access Management solutions and Enterprise Security Solutions.

### Security Requirement

The successful bidder must be able to provide a team of IT Security/cybersecurity professionals with the minimum security clearance of Secret. The technical submissions will be evaluated using evaluation criteria to ensure compliance with government standards for online identity and data protection.

### Bidder Eligibility

This RFP is restricted to TBIPS (Task and Solution-Based Contracting Arrangement Holders) who have qualified under Tier 1 in the National Capital Region. The following candidates have been invited to submit a proposal:

1. Accenture Inc.
2. Advanced Chippewa Technologies Inc.
3. Alika Internet Technologies Inc.
4. CALIAN (In Joint Venture with DWP Solutions Inc.)
5. Cistel Technology Inc.
6. Deloitte Inc.
7. Ernst & Young LLP
8. Excel Human Resources Inc.
9. General Dynamics Land Systems – Canada Corporation
10. IBM Canada Limited/IBM Canada Limited
11. Pricewaterhouse Coopers LLP
12. Sabytel Technologies Inc.
13. TEKSYSTEMS CANADA CORP./TEKSYSTEMS CANADA CORP.
14. TELUS Communications Inc.
15. TRM Technologies Inc.

### Contact Information

For any additional information or clarification, please contact:

Bassam EL-DAYA
Contracting Authority
Phone: (343) 571-6911
Email: DFO.tenders-soumissions.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca

### Attachment

References documents can be found at the following public portal: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/tender.AGGC009790
